trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ContextChangeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.

Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select" />, <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect" />, <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter" /> and <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave" /> events of an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> object and the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter" />, <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave" />, <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select" />, and <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect" /> events of an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> 对象的 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select" />、<see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect" />、<see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter" /> 和 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave" /> 事件以及 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> 对象的 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter" />、<see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave" />、<see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select" /> 和 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ContextChangeEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ContextChangeEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, until you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 每当发生该事件时，直到移除了该委托，都会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave?displayProperty=fullName> events.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter?displayProperty=fullName>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave?displayProperty=fullName>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect?displayProperty=fullName> events are raised, the event handlers add double lines to the borders of the selection or remove the double lines, depending on the event.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect?displayProperty=fullName>将引发事件，事件处理程序添加到所选内容的边框的双线或删除双线，具体取决于事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave?displayProperty=fullName> events are raised, the event handlers display messages that state the names of the newly selected node and the previously selected node.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave?displayProperty=fullName>将引发事件，事件处理程序显示消息，指出新选择的节点和先前选择的节点的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> named `CustomerNode`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>名为`CustomerNode`。
